price: Kisha waambiwe: Haya ndiyo mliyo kuwa mkiyakadhabisha.
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
footnotes: Kisha wataambiwa kwa kuwakebehi: Hii basi ndiyo adhabu inayo kuteremkieni ambayo mlikuwa mkiikanusha duniani!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
